verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H4172>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H2844>dread<s%> of you shall be on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> are they <S%H5414>delivered.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H7430>moving<s%> thing that <S%H2416>lives<s%> shall be <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; even as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> things.
But <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H5315>life<s%> thereof, which is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, shall you not <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And <S%H389>surely<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H5315>lives<s%> will I <S%H1875>require;<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> it, and at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H120>man;<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

Whoever <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> by <S%H120>man<s%> shall his <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H8210>shed:<s%> for in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H120>man.<s%>
And you, be you <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> <S%H8317>bring<s%> <S%H8317>forth<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> therein.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
And I, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, and with your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you;

And with <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, of the <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> of the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with you; from <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of a <S%H3999>flood;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, for <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1755>generations:<s%>
I do <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7198>bow<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and it shall be for a <S%H226>token<s%> of a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, when I <S%H6049>bring<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%>

And I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be in the <S%H6051>cloud;<s%> and I will <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, that I may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> This is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> that <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> were <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth:<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah:<s%> and of them was the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5310>covered.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be an <S%H376>farmer,<s%> <S%H127><s%> and he <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard:<s%>
And he <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and was <S%H7943>drunken;<s%> and he was <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%>

And <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H322>backward,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of their <S%H1>father;<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were <S%H322>backward,<s%> and they <S%H7200>saw<s%> not their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall he be to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall be his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6601>enlarge<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall be his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
